scan.title: Tag Input
scan.description: Enter an 8-character RFID tag UID. The tag will be automatically registered when you complete the input.
scan.tip2: Tag will auto-submit when 8 characters are entered
scan.tip3: Input will automatically clear after successful registration

settings.title: Settings
settings.webhookConfigDesc: Configure webhooks to send RFID tag events to external systems.
settings.webhookCardUidKeyDesc: The key name used for the Card UID in webhook payloads (default: card_uid).
settings.tagThrottleTimeDesc: If a tag is scanned multiple times within this window, subsequent scans will be ignored. Set to 0 to disable.
settings.dataManagementDesc: Manage log data. These actions are irreversible.
settings.confirmResetTagEvents:
Are you sure you want to delete all Tag Events?

settings.confirmResetWebhookLogs:

settings.resetTagEventsSuccess:

Deleted records: {count}
settings.resetWebhookLogsSuccess:
Webhook Logs have been reset.
Deleted records: {count}
settings.confirmDeleteWebhook: Are you sure you want to delete webhook "{name}"?
settings.webhookTestSuccess: Webhook test successful! Check the webhook logs for details.

webhook.name: Name
webhook.createFirst: Add your first webhook to get started.

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.noEventData: No event data available for this period

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: TagFlow is a system that collects and manages RFID tag events in real-time. You can monitor tag scan data, integrate with external systems through webhooks, and analyze data through various reports.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: View real-time tag event status, webhook success rate, and recent events at a glance.

tagInput.title: Tag Input
tagInput.description: Manually input 8-character RFID tag UIDs to create events. Tags are automatically registered upon input completion.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: View various analytics data including period-based event statistics, most active cards, and webhook performance. Export to CSV available.

webhook.title: Webhook Settings
webhook.description: Configure webhooks to send data to external systems when tag events occur. Supports custom headers and field mapping.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: Log in with the default account (admin / admin123).
gettingStarted.step2: Register necessary webhooks in the Settings menu.
gettingStarted.step3: Register or scan RFID tags in the Tag Input menu.
gettingStarted.step4: Monitor data through the Dashboard and Reports.

roles.title: User Roles
roles.adminDesc: Full access to all features, user management, system configuration
roles.operatorDesc: Tag input, dashboard view, report view

help.title: Need Help?
help.description: Contact your system administrator or refer to the documentation.

users.title: User Management
users.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete user "{username}"?

tags.title: Tag Management
tags.description: RFID tags are automatically registered when they are scanned by an RFID reader. Each tag event is captured and processed by the system, creating a record in the database.
tags.step2: Tag UID is sent to the backend via HTTP request
tags.step3: System creates a tag event record
tags.step4: Configured webhooks are triggered to notify external systems
tags.viewReports: To view tag events and statistics, visit the Reports page.
